title: hacking tools
extract: Top Ten Tools For Cybersecurity Pros (and Black Hat Hackers)1 – Metasploit Framework. The tool that turned hacking into a commodity when it was released in 2003, the Metasploit Framework made cracking known vulnerabilities as easy as point and click. ... 2 – Nmap. ... 3 – OpenSSH. ... 4 – Wireshark. ... 5 – Nessus. ... 6 – Aircrack-ng. ... 7 – Snort. ... 8 – John the Ripper.More items...•Nov 17, 2017
extract_html:
Top Ten Tools For Cybersecurity Pros (and Black Hat Hackers)
  • 1 – Metasploit Framework. The tool that turned hacking into a commodity when it was released in 2003, the Metasploit Framework made cracking known vulnerabilities as easy as point and click. ...
  • 2 – Nmap. ...
  • 3 – OpenSSH. ...
  • 4 – Wireshark. ...
  • 5 – Nessus. ...
  • 6 – Aircrack-ng. ...
  • 7 – Snort. ...
  • 8 – John the Ripper.
